channel.title: False_Positive on Policy to Packets
channel.description: Recent content in False_Positive on Policy to Packets

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC104 - Malware Detected - EventID 84
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC104 alert writeup investigating a malware detection event (EventID 84), validating the WinRAR installer hash using VirusTotal and Hybrid Analysis, reviewing SIEM logs, and determining a false positive from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC119 - Proxy - Malicious Executable File Detected - EventID 83
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC119 proxy alert writeup investigating a malicious executable detection (EventID 83), validating URL, domain, and IP reputation using VirusTotal and log analysis, and determining a false positive from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC104 - Malware Detected - EventID 14
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC alert writeup analyzing a malware detection event (EventID 14), validating file reputation in VirusTotal, reviewing endpoint and log data, and determining a false positive from a SOC analyst perspective.
